entry.title: Globe SP60 60 QT Gear Driven Planetary Mixer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Globe
Type: Mixers
Price: 11903.00

        FEATURES

  • Powerful 3 HP, 220/60/1, 23 amp or 208/60/3, 9 amp custom built motor

  • Non-slip rubber feet
  • Shipping weight 795 lbs.
  • Overall dimensions 25"W x 28.4"D x 51"H
  • 6 foot cord, no plug
  • ETL and NSF listed

  • Interlocking guard easy to attach and remove for easy cleaning

entry.title: Globe G14 G Series 14" Medium Duty Manual Slicer

Vendor: Globe
Type: Slicers
Price: 2034.00

      FEATURES

  • Globe Slicer Hard chromed, special alloy hollow ground blade 14"
  • Powerful knife motor ½ HP, 115-60-1, 3 amps
  • Globe Meat Slicer Improved gravity feed chute glides with ease for perfect slicing
  • Slices through numerous applications including cheese
  • Globe Slicer Motor overload protection with manual reset
  • Top mounted all metal knife sharpener
  • Globe Meat Slicer Popular, durable, European design with sleek, modern, rounded corners that are easy-to-clean
  • Globe Slicer Dual purpose endweight handle with ergonomic design allows for easier operation
  • Improved product grip and slicing performance
  • Globe Meat Slicer 0 to 9/16" slice thickness
  • Globe Meat Slicer Anodized aluminum construction with seamless edges and radius corners
  • Oversized positive traction grooved belt drive
  • Globe Slicer Knife cover interlock disables the slicer when the knife cover is removed
  • Globe Meat Slicer Large product receiving area
  • Smooth Stainless steel ball bearing chute slide
  • Globe Slicer 35° angled food chute
  • Dual purpose handle with improved ergonomic design
  • Large table adjustment and chute removal knobs for improved grip and better indexing control
  • Power indicator light
  • No-volt release relay prevents inadvertent activation of the slicer
  • Globe Meat Slicer Removable, easy-to-clean chute, slice deflector, knife cover and sharpener
  • Metal bottom enclosure
  • Globe Slicer Permanently attached knife ring guard
  • No voltage release relay system
  • This Globe Meat Slicer is ETL and NSF listed
